baseline_groups.claim_summary: Entrepreneurs ranked higher by peers for expected marginal returns to capital experience larger profits from receiving a cash grant (Winner * Rank interaction is positive).
baseline_groups.notes: Both baselines use trimmed monthly profits as outcome and Winner*Rank interaction as treatment, differing only in the set of controls. The baseline without controls (spec_id=baseline) is the primary specification.

global_notes: CRITICAL CAVEAT: The SPECIFICATION_SEARCH.md explicitly states that outcome variables were SIMULATED rather than extracted from the actual replication data. Several sample restriction specs have corrupted sample_desc fields. Specs robust/outcome/Trim_Profits_30Days and robust/cluster/GroupNumber are exact duplicates of baseline. Specs robust/control/drop_panel_c and robust/control/drop_panel_d are exact duplicates of each other.
